Detailed Description

Imagination Technologies

Description:
This file contains the structure and function prototypes for the MobileTV Host-side communications API.


Platform:
Platform Independent

  • 1.0 1st Release




Typedef Documentation

typedef struct H2D_tag_sAsyncBufferDescriptor H2D_sAsyncBufferDesc

This struct defines a group of buffers to be queued for receipt of async msgs

typedef struct H2D_tag_sAsyncCallbackDescriptor H2D_sAsyncCallbackDesc

This struct defines the type of async message received as well as buffers storing the data

typedef H2D_eCBResult( * H2D_pfnEventCallback)(const H2D_sAsyncCallbackDesc *psAsyncDesc)

H2D_pfnEventCallback

Description:
This is the prototype for the asynchronous callback function.

psAsyncDesc : Structure holding received message type and buffer information

H2D_eCBResult : This function returns either H2D_CB_SUCCESS or an H2D_eCBResult error code.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum H2D_eResult

This type defines the H2D function return codes.

Enumerator:
H2D_SUCCESS  Success.
H2D_ILLEGAL_PARAM  Function call has illegal param(s).
H2D_TIMEOUT  Timeout has occurred.
H2D_RSP_BUFF_OVERFLOW  Response buffer overflow.
H2D_CB_ALREADY_DEFINED  Callback function already defined.
H2D_CB_NOT_DEFINED  Callback function not defined.
H2D_BUFF_QUEUE_OVERFLOW  Buffer queue overflow.

enum H2D_eCBResult

This type defines the H2D callback function return codes.

Enumerator:
H2D_CB_SUCCESS  Success.
H2D_CB_ERROR1  TBD, etc.

enum H2D_eAsyncEvent

This type defines the H2D callback function event codes.

Enumerator:
H2D_AE_MSG  Info/event/message.
H2D_AE_DATA  Data.
H2D_AE_COMMS_ERROR  Error has occurred.

enum H2D_eBuffType

This type defines the H2D buffer type.

Enumerator:
H2D_BT_MSG  Info/event/message.
H2D_BT_DATA  Data.

H2D_eResult H2D_SendCmdGetRsp ( IMG_UINT8 *  pui8CmdBuff,
IMG_UINT32  ui32CmdNumBytes,
IMG_UINT8 *  pui8RspBuff,
IMG_UINT32  ui32RspBuffMaxBytes,
IMG_UINT32  ui32Timeout,
IMG_UINT32 *  pui32RspNumBytes 
)

H2D_SendCmdGetRsp

Description:
This function sends a command from the host to the device and obtains a response with an optional timeout.

pui8CmdBuff : The pointer to the command buffer.

ui32CmdNumBytes : The number of bytes in the command buffer.

pui8RspBuff : The pointer to the response buffer.

ui32RspBuffMaxBytes : The maximum size of the response buffer.

ui32Timeout : The command/response timeout value (in milliseconds, or zero for infinite timeout period).

pui32RspNumBytes : The actual number of response bytes received (may be greater than ui32RspBuffMaxBytes, but in this case the extra bytes will not have been saved in the buffer and an error code - H2D_RSP_BUFF_OVERFLOW - will be returned).

H2D_eResult : Either H2D_SUCCESS or an H2D_eResult error code

H2D_eResult H2D_SendCmdDisable ( IMG_UINT8 *  pui8CmdBuff,
IMG_UINT32  ui32CmdNumBytes,
IMG_UINT32  ui32Timeout 
)

H2D_SendCmdDisable

Description:
This function sends a command from the host to the device and disables the host communications.

pui8CmdBuff : The pointer to the command buffer.

ui32CmdNumBytes : The number of bytes in the command buffer.

ui32Timeout : The command/response timeout value (in milliseconds, or zero for infinite timeout period).

H2D_eResult : Either H2D_SUCCESS or an H2D_eResult error code

H2D_eResult H2D_QueueBuff ( const H2D_sAsyncBufferDesc *  psBufferDesc  ) 

H2D_QueueBuff

Description:
This function queues a buffer for storing info/event/messages or data from the device.

psBufferDesc : A structure describing the groups of buffers to queue.

H2D_eResult : Either H2D_SUCCESS or an H2D_eResult error code

H2D_eResult H2D_AddCallback ( H2D_pfnEventCallback  pfnEventCallback  ) 

H2D_AddCallback

Description:
This function adds an asynchronous callback. The caller provides the address of a function that will be called when an asynchronous event occurs. The callback is persistent and is not removed when the application callback function is invoked.

Only one callback function may be defined at any given time. The callback function is removed using H2D_RemoveCallback().

pfnEventCallback : A pointer to the application callback function

H2D_eResult : Either H2D_SUCCESS or an H2D_eResult error code

H2D_eResult H2D_RemoveCallback ( IMG_VOID   ) 

H2D_RemoveCallback

Description:
This function removes the defined event callback. If the callback is already in progress when this function is called then it will complete normally; otherwise, the callback will be cancelled and no user callback will be made.

H2D_eResult : Either H2D_SUCCESS or an H2D_eResult error code
